summary: a new hello kitty theme park is being built in china .   the 9.5-hectare theme park is due to open on new year 's day 2015 .   creators of hello kitty , sanrio , have joined forces with american firm the hettema group to build the park .   between 35 and 40 of sanrio 's best-loved cartoon characters will be incorporated into the theme park .   the park is expected to attract over a million visitors each year .
